tidbits.title: Mayan Heritage
tidbits.description: Guatemala is rich in Mayan heritage, with ancient ruins like Tikal, offering a glimpse into one of the world's most advanced ancient civilizations.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country boasts diverse landscapes, from volcanic highlands and lush rainforests to beautiful lakeshores, providing stunning natural vistas.

tidbits.title: Vibrant Culture
tidbits.description: Guatemala has a vibrant culture reflected in its colorful markets, traditional textiles, unique cuisine like pepi√°n, and lively celebrations like Semana Santa.
